version_description:
1、增加多国语言；
2、首页增加NVR、DVR实时截图
3、增加鱼眼全境处理效果，包括100W、130W、壁挂／顶挂切换，本地录像播放
4、优化音频播放效果
5、优化对讲语音效果
1. Added 7 additional language support (German, French, Polish, Czech, Russian, Italian, Spanish)
2. Added NVR, DVR real-time screenshots
